resources.string: The first row from the SQL query shows up here
Enter an SQL query to execute. \nFor this test, it must be a select statement that returns only one string column!
Enter url for connecting to the Viand System database
It is usually of the form:\n jdbc:aceql:http://server_ip_here:9090/ServerSqlManager
